alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 4:14PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Huerfano and southwestern Pueblo Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 414 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles east of Junkins Burn Scar to 6 miles northeast of Greenhorn Mountain to near Farisita. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenhorn Mountain, Rye, Beulah, San Isabel and Colorado City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft
